thread.title: Amazon to let Prime members download videos
thread.title_full: Amazon to let Prime members download videos

author: MAE ANDERSON
title: Amazon to let Prime members download videos
text:
Mark Lennihan Amazon to let Prime members download videos 
FILE - In this Sept. 28, 2011 file photo, the Amazon.com logo is displayed at a news conference in New York. The e-commerce powerhouse on Tuesday, Sept. 1, 2015 said it will now let members of its $99 annual Prime loyalty program download some shows and movies on its streaming video service to watch offline, or when there is no Internet connection available, for free. (AP Photo/Mark Lennihan, File) Posted: Tuesday, September 1, 2015 1:28 pm | Updated: 4:00 pm, Tue Sep 1, 2015. Amazon to let Prime members download videos   
NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon is upping the ante in the streaming-video competition with downloadable videos. 
The e-commerce powerhouse will now let members of its $99 annual Prime loyalty program download some shows and movies on its streaming video service to watch offline, or when there is no Internet connection available, for free. kAm%@ H2E49 E96 4@?E6?E FD6CD 42? 5@H?=@25 E96 p>2K@?
